subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols had the opportunity to play his entire career with one team, the St. Louis Cardinals, but as one baseball executive said, “it’s the way the game is today.”
snippet: Albert Pujols had the opportunity to play his entire career with one team, the St. Louis Cardinals, but as one baseball executive said, “it’s the way the game is today.”
